tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Greetings! The clinic hygiene is greatly maintained and special attention to sanitization of all visitors are taken care by the clinic staff.The doctor himself is well equipped with all safety and protective gear.The doctor is very polite and gentle, he interact with our child as a friend.The doctor examine both of our kids one at a time ensuring to provide personal attention to each.The doctor vaccinated our kids with great care and such a clinical precision that even our 3 years old doesn't even feel being poked\/pinch while getting vaccinated.Above all, the doctor with great attention and patience reviewed the miscellaneous Immunization Record that we have due to different cities and cards over the time, and given us apt advise and directions to follow, with all our queries being well answered.We are very very happy with the doctor and the clinic staff and also highly satisfied with the Do's and Don'ts measure being followed in current days. Be noted, the clinic also facilitates with digital record of child health and digital payment modes to reduce chances of contamination, if any, with physical carrier. Thank you, Dr. Vishal Vaidya for the care, our kid recalls you as \"Mr.DoctorUncle\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We recently moved to Dwarka and weren’t able to identify a regular doctor for our 5 year old, having met two different doctors previously.
Dr. Vishal Vaidya was very good. He established a quick rapport with our child and also explained with patience various reasons for her recurring cough/cold and then zeroed down on her diagnosis. He also advised on her vaccination scheduled inherited from previous doctors and filled out her school medical chart as well.

We are happy with him and assured that our child is in good hands

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My visit to your clinic was really pleasant. It was my first visit. I was really scared to take my baby to clinic in covid -19 times. But when I visited Dr. Vishal's clinic all my worries vanished. Every thing was properly sanitised, whether it was chairs, benches, baby weighing machine. I felt safe. Dr. Vishal was very humble and cleared our doubts with proper explanation. His approach to the parents and the baby is very positive. Your caring and extra effort to make your patient comfortable is truly remarkable. Thank you 😊

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Hello Dr.Vishal - Hope you r doing well.Nilesh is much better  now with your medication only and Fever is in stable state.Thanx a lot.You have been his saviour many times.As Nilesh is feeling some weakness now,can you pls suggest some tonic nd appetiser for him as he does not like to eat any thing apart frm fried food.Any requirement of calcium in his case,pls suggest.I hve sent you watsap msg also on which You can reply.Regards,Mother of Nilesh.
reply_text:
Good to know Nilesh is doing well. You can give him 
Syp bevon 5 ml once daily for 1 month
Syp gemcal p 5 ml morning and night for 1 month 
Both after food

review: Great experience as a first timer. I barely waited to be helped when I checked in. The staff and Dr. vishal were all very friendly and helpful. I especially loved how Dr. Vishal really took his time to explain my child conditions with me as well as their treatment options. I had a great visit and the doctor’s demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this

Very much satisfied with doctor as his friendly & caring  nature always made my kids comfortable. Also the way he explain about the treatment and guidence always make things easy for us to tackle our child.
Specially i would recommend him as my daughter was an under weight baby and only his guidance made us meet all the parametres on time than.
His prompt attention at any time is commendable.
Also staff guesture is also very nice.
